instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1278: What is A1278? A1278 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook or Macbook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2254, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2327, 820-2530, 820-2879, 820-2936, 820-3115..
definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.ISL6259: What is ISL6259? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2010 through 2015.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>,must hold power button for 5-6 seconds to power on with battery
threads.message:
Hi guys,
working on an <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board, it got liquid spilled before, around SMC area, no power at all originally.
fixed the circuits then it can run with charger. but once battery inserted,it can't power on.

check the <SIGNAL>BAT_LOW</SIGNAL> signal was not present, then replaced the SMC, status changed, it can power on even with battery inserted now, but only power on normally with charger connected as well.
if no charger, you must hold the power button for 5-6 seconds then the machine will power on.

it can charge battery,detects battery.

another SMC had been replaced too, same result. another battery,same result.

don't know where to start this now

any advice would be appreciated.

thank you

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>,must hold power button for 5-6 seconds to power on with battery
threads.message: Check sense resistor circuit to pin 17/18 27/28 of <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP>
